formulas.description: Set the target month based on the selected target date
formulas.name: GsSetTargetMonth
SetTargetDate
formulas.expression: IF( MONTH( DATE(VALUE({!varGoalRecord.GsGoalPeriod__r.Name}),{!GetMonthNumber},1)) = 12, DATE( YEAR( DATE(VALUE({!varGoalRecord.GsGoalPeriod__r.Name}),{!GetMonthNumber},1)), 12, 31 ), DATE( YEAR( DATE(VALUE({!varGoalRecord.GsGoalPeriod__r.Name}),{!GetMonthNumber},1)), MONTH ( DATE(VALUE({!varGoalRecord.GsGoalPeriod__r.Name}),{!GetMonthNumber},1)) + 1, 1 ) - 1 )
